'''Calder Cob''' is a character created specifically for [[The Lord of the Rings Online]]. 

Calder was a citizen of [[Archet]] who turned traitor for the [[Blackwolds]] by supplying them information on the town's defenses. His treachery was uncovered by [[Jon Brackenbrook]], the son of the Captain of Archet. [[Captain Brackenbrook]] was unconvinced of Calder's betrayal because it was Calder who had previously imprisoned the former leader of the [[Blackwolds]], [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Otto the Brigand|Otto]]. [[Captain Brackenbrook]] was eventually convinced by [[List of minor The Lord of the Rings Online characters in Bree-land#Dirk Mudbrick|Dirk Mudbrick]], another soldier in Archet.<ref name="SOA">{{VGC|SAIB}}</ref>

Calder was imprisoned in Archet but escaped along with Otto in the Assault of Archet after killing his jailer [[Ned Pruner]]. Calder was killed at some point during the Assault .<ref name="SOA" />
